name: Atlantis Sports Bar & Lounge
description: 24-hour sports bar located across from the Race & Sports Book, featuring 28 TV screens tuned to the nation's sporting events. Enjoy an extensive draft beer selection, over 90 whiskies from around the world, and great food from Manhattan Deli. Daily Happy Hour from 3pm to 6pm with half off drinks and select food. Every seat feels like a front row experience.
shortDescription: 24-hour sports bar with 28 TVs, 90+ whiskies, and daily happy hour at the Atlantis.

faqs.question: Is the Sports Bar open 24 hours?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's open 24/7 and located right across from the Race & Sports Book.

faqs.question: When is Happy Hour?
faqs.answer: Daily from 3pm to 6pm with half off drinks and select food items.

faqs.question: How many TVs are there?
faqs.answer: 28 screens tuned to sporting events from around the country.

testimonials.quote: Atlantis Sports Bar & Lounge has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside atlantis-casino-resort-spa-reno. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Gary B.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Atlantis Sports Bar & Lounge. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Steve W.
